# .NET Runtime and SDK

> The .NET runtime, SDK, and cross-platform development fundamentals. Covers installation, deployment (self-contained, framework-dependent, native AOT), containers, diagnostics, testing, and CLI tools. This is the core platform documentation for modern .NET development.

*Topics available: 2148*

- [Build apps with .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/apps.md): .NET can be used for building many kinds of apps.
- [.NET distribution packaging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/distribution-packaging.md): Learn how to package, name, and version .NET for distribution.
- [Get started with .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/get-started.md): Create a Hello World .NET app.
- [Introduction to .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/introduction.md): Learn about .NET. .NET is a free, open-source development platform for building many kinds of apps.
- [.NET releases, patches, and support](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/releases-and-support.md): Learn about releases, patches, and support for .NET.
- [.NET Runtime Identifier (RID) catalog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/rid-catalog.md): Learn about the runtime identifier (RID) and how RIDs are used in .NET.
- [.NET SDK overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/sdk.md): Learn about the .NET SDK (formerly known as the .NET Core SDK), which is a set of libraries and tools used to create .NET projects.

## Subtopics

- [Additional tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/additional-tools/llms.txt): Topics available: 11; Additional tools documentation and reference.
- [Breaking Changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/llms.txt): Topics available: 537; Breaking changes and API differences between .NET versions.
- [Containers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/containers/llms.txt): Topics available: 3; Build container images with built-in .NET SDK support.
- [Dependency Loading Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/dependency-loading/llms.txt): Topics available: 7; Dependency Loading Docs documentation and reference.
- [Deployment](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/llms.txt): Topics available: 155; Publish apps: single-file, ReadyToRun, Native AOT, and cross-platform.
- [Diagnostics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/diagnostics/llms.txt): Topics available: 68; Logging, tracing, metrics, and diagnostic tools for troubleshooting.
- [Docker Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/docker/llms.txt): Topics available: 3; Docker Docs documentation and reference.
- [Enrichment Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/enrichment/llms.txt): Topics available: 5; Enrichment Docs documentation and reference.
- [Microsoft.Extensions Libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/llms.txt): Topics available: 63; DI, configuration, logging, caching, and HTTP clients.
- [Install Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/llms.txt): Topics available: 20; Install Docs documentation and reference.
- [Native Interop Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/native-interop/llms.txt): Topics available: 1; Native Interop Docs documentation and reference.
- [Porting from .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/porting/llms.txt): Topics available: 23; Migrate from .NET Framework to modern .NET with Upgrade Assistant.
- [Project SDK Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/project-sdk/llms.txt): Topics available: 3; Project SDK Docs documentation and reference.
- [Introduction to resilient app development](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/resilience/llms.txt): Topics available: 2; Introduction to resilient app development documentation and reference.
- [Resources Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/resources/llms.txt): Topics available: 1; Resources Docs documentation and reference.
- [Runtime Configuration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-config/llms.txt): Topics available: 8; Configure runtime via runtimeconfig.json and environment variables.
- [Runtime Discovery Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-discovery/llms.txt): Topics available: 1; Runtime Discovery Docs documentation and reference.
- [SDK Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/sdk/llms.txt): Topics available: 2; SDK Docs documentation and reference.
- [Testing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/llms.txt): Topics available: 120; Unit, integration, and load testing with MSTest, xUnit, and NUnit.
- [.NET CLI Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tools/llms.txt): Topics available: 126; CLI commands: `dotnet new`, `build`, `run`, `test`, and `publish`.
- [.NET Tutorials](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tutorials/llms.txt): Topics available: 19; .NET Tutorials documentation and reference.
- [.NET unmanaged API reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/unmanaged-api/llms.txt): Topics available: 941; .NET unmanaged API reference documentation and reference.
- [.NET Versioning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/versions/llms.txt): Topics available: 2; Version numbers, LTS/STS releases, and SDK version pinning.
- [Whats New Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/llms.txt): Topics available: 20; Whats New Docs documentation and reference.
